Applet Codebook: NIMH EMA for Mindlogger v0.27 Intro To Protocol (IN PROGRESS) 0.1 NIMH - EMA: Daily Assessments

Applet Codebook: NIMH EMA for Mindlogger v0.27 Mike X. 2020-03-25 Intro To Protocol (IN PROGRESS) 0.1 NIMH - EMA: Daily Assessments This MindLogger applet collects daily information on your physical and mental health. You will be asked a set of questions multiple times a day. We will record the information and share it with you and our researchers so we can look for patterns in the data. Answer these questions to the best of your ability. It is okay if you don‚Äôt know the answers to some of them! 0.1.1 ‚òÄÔ∏è Example topics for questions in the morning üõå how many hours you have slept üò¥ whether or not you had nightmares or night terrors üíä if you took any sleep aids 0.1.2 üåô Example topics for questions during midday and in the evening üò∞ stress level ‚ö°Ô∏è energy level üè• overall health Thank you for your participation! These questions were constructed as part of a collaboration between the National Institute of Mental Health and the MATTER Lab of the Child Mind Institute (https://matter.childmind.org).
